import React from'react';import{QRCodeCanvas}from'qrcode.react';// Note: Using QRCodeCanvas
import{X}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const QRCodeModal=_ref=>{let{showQRCode,setShowQRCode,roomId,currentTheme}=_ref;if(!showQRCode)return null;const roomLink=`${window.location.origin}?room=${roomId}`;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"fixed inset-0 bg-black/70 backdrop-blur-sm flex items-center justify-center z-50 transition-all duration-300",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`${currentTheme.card} border rounded-2xl p-8 max-w-sm w-full shadow-2xl animate-slide-up`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-between items-center mb-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:`text-xl font-bold ${currentTheme.textPrimary} gradient-text`,children:"Share Realm"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setShowQRCode(false),className:`${currentTheme.buttonSecondary} p-2 rounded-full ${currentTheme.hover} transition-all duration-200`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(X,{className:"w-6 h-6"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex justify-center mb-6 bg-white p-4 rounded-xl",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(QRCodeCanvas,{value:roomLink,size:200,bgColor:"#ffffff",fgColor:"#1e293b"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:`text-sm ${currentTheme.textSecondary} text-center break-all font-mono`,children:roomLink})]})});};export default QRCodeModal;
